CustomField.description: Displayes the lead score of the ultimate parents if it is not empty. Adjusted for new Lead Score 2 on 05.03.2025 (PK)
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(ParentId), "", IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Lead_Score_2__c))), TEXT(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Lead_Score_2__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Parent.Parent.Parent.Lead_Score_2__c))), TEXT(Parent.Parent.Parent.Lead_Score_2__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Parent.Parent.Lead_Score_2__c))), TEXT(Parent.Parent.Lead_Score_2__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Parent.Lead_Score_2__c))), TEXT(Parent.Lead_Score_2__c), TEXT(Lead_Score_2__c) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displayes the lead score of the ultimate parents if it is not empty.
CustomField.label: Ultimate Parent Lead Score
